EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Email Confirm Request - India 12/4
EmailTemplate.subject: Please confirm your attendance: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - India 12/4
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in India on Thursday, December 4, 2014.
Due to the overwhelming interest in this series, we are asking that registrants confirm their attendance <http://connect.pivotal.io/PCF-Roadshow-India-12-4.html>. We have capacity limitations at our venue and would like to ensure that we are set-up to accommodate those who wish to take part in our sessions throughout the day.
Please confirm your attendance <http://connect.pivotal.io/PCF-Roadshow-India-12-4.html>, print your confirmation email and present upon your arrival to the event.
Should you fail to confirm your registration, we will not allow entry into the event.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
